title: Ranked LAGGES HIGH PING 08.06.2015 13:45-14:15
body:
**Hey League of Legends Members i start play at 13:45 a ranked for fun but then i got only ping over 300ms and my mates and the emnys too!**
_I lost 18lp i want they back! Thats not fair ! give us our points back :( And fix your Server first and stop your Bad Patching phase, first make your servers normaly ! pls :) _

replies.body: And if your Servers not normaly works then stop Rank noboy can normaly play and much lose his or her LP for nothing :(
Thats the German timezone i dont write it sry
